Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(ui): remove duplicate parameter declarations in UserNotFoundErrorBoundary

Remove redundant ErrorContent and ChildContent parameter declarations
that duplicated inherited parameters from ErrorBoundary base class,
causing Blazor runtime error about case-insensitive parameter name conflicts.

Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: Implement GitOrganization entity with CQRS commands and visibility support" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- Add GitOrganization entity with full CQRS implementation including commands, events, and projections
- Implement visibility feature (Public/Private/Internal) for GitOrganization with corresponding event and command
- Add comprehensive validators for all GitOrganization commands (Add, ChangeDescription, Enable, Disable, Sync, ChangeVisibility)
- Create REST API controller with endpoints for managing GitOrganization entities
- Add unit tests for command validators

## Test plan

- [ ] Verify all GitOrganization command validators pass unit tests
- [ ] Test REST API endpoints for CRUD operations on GitOrganization
- [ ] Verify visibility change functionality works correctly
- [ ] Ensure projection handlers properly update view models when events are applied
- [ ] Run full build to confirm no compilation errors

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")
